USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

-- Create view from gold schema using OPENROWSET()

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT
result.filepath(1) AS YEAR,
result.filepath(2) AS MONTH,
result.*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)
WITH(
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_day VARCHAR(10),
    trip_day_weekend_ind CHAR(1),
    card_trip_count INT,
    cash_trip_count INT
) AS [result];

SELECT *
FROM gold.vw_trip_data_green;
